video_prompt: Anime woman, blue metallic bass guitar, dynamic play. Hair or clothing moves with guitar strumming. Focus on the energy of the performance. Background chains sway subtly. Lighting shifts to emphasize action.
image_prompt: **Anime woman, blue metallic bass guitar, vibrant pink background, blue sports bra, distressed blue jeans, studded belt, chain waist, pink fingerless gloves, blonde updo, purple eyes, pink eyebrows/lashes, soft pink lips/cheeks, fair skin, black choker, silver ring, silver earring, black guitar strap. Dark blue metallic bass, black headstock/neck, white fret lines, silver tuners/frets, silver strings, black bridge, silver/black knobs, black pickups, pink/black Alien Workshop-style sticker. Foreground/background black chains, overhead lighting, rebellious, edgy.**
refined_video_prompt: A woman's body dynamically sways and pivots with powerful bass strumming. Her fingers rapidly traverse the fretboard, while hair whips and clothing ripples in response to the music's energy. Her expression intensifies, reflecting the performance's passion. Background chains gently sway. Lighting dramatically shifts and pulses, accentuating the rhythm and key actions.
